events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized this issue under Refund based on customer mention of requesting money back.
Support agent Sarah Johnson has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello, I’m Sarah from support. I’m sorry to hear you got the wrong item and I’ll be happy to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456, and I’ve attached a clear photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response, I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm you have received your refund and everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since the refund has been confirmed and no further issues reported, this case will now be closed. Thank you!
We have sent you a short customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our support services.
The customer has completed the satisfaction survey and provided positive feedback about the refund process.
This case has been archived as all issues have been resolved and feedback has been received.
